頭をかかえる: (あたまをかかえる) - to be greatly perplexed; to be troubled; to be at wits' end
頭をひねる: (あたまをひねる) - to puzzle over; to think deeply about; to wrack one's brains over
頭をもたげる: (あたまをもたげる) - to raise one's head; to come to the fore; to rise into importance; to gain strength; to rear its head
頭を下げる: (あたまをさげる) - to bow/to bow one's head; to apologize/to apologise; to bow to/to yield to/to admire
頭を丸める: (あたまをまるめる) - to be tonsured/to have one's head shaved; to become a monk
頭を付ける: (あたまをつける) - {sumo} to stop the opponent by pressing one's head into his chest
頭を使う: (あたまをつかう) - to use one's head
頭を働かせる: (あたまをはたらかせる) - to think; to use one's head; to exercise one's brains
頭を冷やす: (あたまをひやす) - to cool down one's anger
頭を刈る: (あたまをかる) - to have one's hair cut; to cut one's hair
頭を垂れる: (こうべをたれる) - to bow one's head; to hang one's head; to droop (e.g. ears of grain)
頭を悩ます: (あたまをなやます) - to rack one's brains
頭を抱える: (あたまをかかえる) - to be greatly perplexed; to be troubled; to be at wits' end
頭を振る: (かぶりをふる) - to shake one's head (in denial)
頭を捻る: (あたまをひねる) - to puzzle over; to think deeply about; to wrack one's brains over
頭を擡げる: (あたまをもたげる) - to raise one's head; to come to the fore; to rise into importance; to gain strength; to rear its head
頭を痛める: (あたまをいためる) - to be concerned about
頭上: (ずじょう) - overhead; high in sky
頭下し: (あたまくだし) - unsparingly; without listening to the other party; without giving the other party a chance to explain
頭五郎鰯: (トウゴロウイワシ) - flathead silverside (Hypoatherina valenciennei)
頭付き: (あたまつき) - hairstyle/shape of one's head; (かしらつき only)  fish served whole
頭光: (ずこう) - halo (of a Buddhist statue); nimbus
頭出し: (あたまだし) - cueing (e.g. a magnetic tape, recording) (cuing); cue; feeding (e.g. paper under a print head); feed; document loading
頭切れ: (とうきれ) - clipping off the beginning of a speech transmission
頭割り: (あたまわり) - sharing (e.g. expenses); splitting; capitation
頭取: (とうどり) - (bank) president; greenroom manager (in a theater)
頭子音: (とうしいん) - initial consonant; syllable onset
頭字: (かしらじ) - first letter; first letters; initial
頭寒足熱: (ずかんそくねつ) - (yoji) keeping the head cool and feet warm
頭巾海豹: (ズキンアザラシ) - hooded seal (Cystophora cristata)
頭悪い: (あたまわるい) - (ant: 頭いい) slow; dim
頭打ち: (ずうち) - reaching a peak; reaching the limit; plateauing; maxing out
頭抜ける: (ずぬける) - to tower above; to stand out
頭抱える: (あたまかかえる) - to be greatly perplexed; to be troubled
頭文字: (かしらもじ) - initials/initialism; first letter of a word; acronym; capital letter
頭書: (かしらがき) - headnote/heading/superscription/recitals; above-mentioned/referred to above
頭書き: (かしらがき) - headnote/heading/superscription/recitals; above-mentioned/referred to above
頭株: (あたまかぶ) - chief; leader; head; executive
頭状花: (とうじょうか) - flower head; flowerhead
頭痛の種: (ずつうのたね) - cause of headaches; pain in the neck
頭突きをする: (ずつきをする) - to butt heads; to head-butt
頭立つ: (かしらだつ) - to become the head; to rise to the top; to rank above; to stand above
頭職: (かしらしょく) - appointed official sent to administer a certain region (in the Ryukyu Kingdom)
頭脳明晰: (ずのうめいせき) - (yoji) being clearheaded; having a keen (sharp, brilliant) mind
頭脳流出: (ずのうりゅうしゅつ) - brain drain; outflow of talent
頭脳集団: (ずのうしゅうだん) - think tank
頭蓋内損傷: (ずがいないそんしょう) - intracranial injury
頭虱: (アタマジラミ) - head louse (Pediculus humanus capitis); head lice
頭角: (とうかく) - distinguishing oneself; standing out; top of the head
頭角を現す: (とうかくをあらわす) - to distinguish oneself; to stand out
頭角を現わす: (とうかくをあらわす) - to distinguish oneself; to stand out
頭角を表す: (とうかくをあらわす) - to distinguish oneself; to stand out
頭角を表わす: (とうかくをあらわす) - to distinguish oneself; to stand out
頭記: (とうき) - abovementioned item; description at beginning of (this) text or document
頭語: (とうご) - (e.g. 拝啓 and 謹啓 etc.) the opening greeting on letters
頭越し: (あたまごし) - ignoring; bypassing; doing something without consultation; going over someone's head
頭身: (とうしん) - head and body; (after a number) heads tall (ratio of total height to length of the head)/heads long
頭遣い: (かしらつかい) - puppeteer for the head
頭部外傷: (とうぶがいしょう) - head injury
頭隠して尻隠さず: (あたまかくしてしりかくさず) - don't cover your head and leave your bottom exposed; you have to be careful not to expose your weak point while attempting to protect yourself
頭頂: (とうちょう) - top of the head; vertex (anat.); parietal
頭頂部: (とうちょうぶ) - calvaria; area at top of head; parietal
